text:
San Diego, CA; FULL TIME; ONSITE

- Fullstack Javascript Developer (http://www.lji.org/careers/open-position/javascript-full-sta...)

The La Jolla Institute for Allergy and Immunology - http://lji.org

We are one of the top immunology institutes in the world (#5 last time I checked) that is working on saving the world from disease... all of it. If you are "smart and gets things done", want a life outside of work and like the idea of working for a place that provides an incredible social good to the world, check out the position.
